sn48.42:1.2: Atha kho unnabho brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn48.42:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho unnabho brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn48.42:2.1: “Pancimani, bho gotama, indriyani nanavisayani nanagocarani, na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhonti.
sn48.42:2.4: Imesam nu kho, bho gotama, pancannam indriyanam nanavisayanam nanagocaranam na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhontanam kim patisaranam, ko ca nesam gocaravisayam paccanubhoti”ti?
sn48.42:3.1: “Pancimani, brahmana, indriyani nanavisayani nanagocarani na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhonti.
sn48.42:3.4: Imesam kho, brahmana, pancannam indriyanam nanavisayanam nanagocaranam na annamannassa gocaravisayam paccanubhontanam mano patisaranam, manova nesam gocaravisayam paccanubhoti”ti.
sn48.42:4.8: “Accayasi, brahmana, panham, nasakkhi panhassa pariyantam gahetum.
sn48.42:4.9: Nibbanogadhanhi, brahmana, brahmacariyam vussati nibbanaparayanam nibbanapariyosanan”ti.
sn48.42:5.1: Atha kho unnabho brahmano bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn48.42:6.1: Atha kho bhagava acirapakkante unnabhe brahmane bhikkhu amantesi:
sn48.42:6.2: “seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kutagare va kutagarasalayam va pacinavatapana suriye uggacchante vatapanena rasmi pavisitva kvassa patitthita”ti?
sn48.42:6.4: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, unnabhassa brahmanassa tathagate saddha nivittha mulajata patitthita dalha asamhariya samanena va brahmanena va devena va marena va brahmuna va kenaci va lokasmim.
sn48.42:6.5: Imamhi ce, bhikkhave, samaye unnabho brahmano kalam kareyya, natthi tam samyojanam yena samyojanena samyutto unnabho brahmano puna imam lokam agaccheyya”ti.
